1_town.name: Lioneye's Watch
1_town.flavourtext: Cold, dank and reeking of infection. That's how Hope fares in Wraeclast.

1_2.name: The Coast
1_2.flavourtext: The cliffs echo the hungry madness.

1_2a.name: The Tidal Island
1_2a.flavourtext: Despite the warming sun, the breeze here bites with fangs of ice.

1_3.name: The Mud Flats
1_3.flavourtext: Mud and air seethes with warped life.

1_4.name: The Submerged Passage
1_4.flavourtext: Slime, shadow, and sharp sharp teeth.

1_5.name: The Ledge
1_5.flavourtext: Dusty winds laden with the scent of bone, old and otherwise.

1_6.name: The Climb
1_6.flavourtext: The cliffs glower down like judges in session.

1_7.name: The Prison
1_7.flavourtext: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

1_8.name: Prisoner's Gate
1_8.flavourtext: The cliffs watch with goatish eyes.

1_9.name: The Ship Graveyard
1_9.flavourtext: Whispered agonies of the marooned dead.

1_11.name: Merveil's Caverns
1_11.flavourtext: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

1_fake_act2.name: Act 2
1_fake_act2.flavourtext: DEV NOTE: Off map pip for Way Forward quest

1_fake_road.name: Act 2
1_fake_road.flavourtext: DEV NOTE: Off map pip for Way Forward quest

2_town.name: The Forest Encampment
2_town.flavourtext: A remnant of civility in the wild.

2_2.name: The Old Fields
2_2.flavourtext: Sick pastures, feverish to the touch.

2_2a.name: The Den
2_2a.flavourtext: Hot and sour as the panting of a rabid bear.

2_3.name: The Crossroads
2_3.flavourtext: Life struggles where once it bloomed.

2_5.name: The Crypt
2_5.flavourtext: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

2_4.name: The Broken Bridge
2_4.flavourtext: A pure, soothing river once red and clogged with the victims of war.

2_7.name: The Riverways
2_7.flavourtext: Once tamed rivers now running free.

2_9.name: The Western Forest
2_9.flavourtext: Bathed in the cool light of obsession.

2_12.name: The Wetlands
2_12.flavourtext: Corrupted waters, pouring from the Mantle above.

2_15.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
2_15.flavourtext: The ground aches with desecration. The rain tastes of blight.

3_town.name: The Sarn Encampment
3_town.flavourtext: The forging ground of heroes, past and present.

3_1.name: The City of Sarn
3_1.flavourtext: A harsh light on harsh sights.

3_2.name: The Slums
3_2.flavourtext: Only the wind whistles and whines here now.

3_5.name: The Marketplace
3_5.flavourtext: All the money in the world can't stop a world from ending.

3_6.name: The Catacombs
3_6.flavourtext: Coughing up the dust of dead devotion.

3_7.name: The Battlefront
3_7.flavourtext: Charred flesh and spilled bowels. Sweet and sour.

3_8_1.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
3_8_1.flavourtext: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

3_8_2.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
3_8_2.flavourtext: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

3_9.name: The Docks
3_9.flavourtext: Life pales in the wake of progress.

3_10.name: The Sewers
3_10.flavourtext: What horrors lurk in the bowels of the city?

3_15.name: The Imperial Gardens
3_15.flavourtext: Nature outgrows the designs of Man.

3_17.name: The Library
3_17.flavourtext: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

3_18.name: The Sceptre of God
3_18.flavourtext: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

4_town.name: Highgate
4_town.flavourtext: A frail scab of hope holds Nightmare at bay.

4_1.name: The Aqueduct
4_1.flavourtext: The rushing lifeblood of a long-dead Empire.

4_2.name: The Dried Lake
4_2.flavourtext: Bones of betrayal, ashes of purity.

4_3_3.name: The Crystal Veins
4_3_3.flavourtext: Gifts of the Beast, awaiting plunder.

4_4_1.name: Kaom's Dream
4_4_1.flavourtext: Fury and flame come to life.

4_5_1.name: Daresso's Dream
4_5_1.flavourtext: No matter how far you climb, you never escape the Pits.

4_7.name: The Ascent
4_7.flavourtext: The greater the rise, the greater the fall.

5_town.name: Overseer's Tower
5_town.flavourtext: Vengeance is the slave's ultimate reward.

5_1.name: The Slave Pens
5_1.flavourtext: In Oriath's darkest corner, the spark of rebellion ignites.

5_2.name: The Control Blocks
5_2.flavourtext: The illusion of control is swiftly severed by the blade of reality.

5_3.name: Oriath Square
5_3.flavourtext: What was once the heart of the city is now the heart of the battle.

5_3b.name: The Ruined Square
5_3b.flavourtext: Oriath's bleeding heart is the main course in a terrible feast.

5_4.name: The Templar Courts
5_4.flavourtext: Only those with faithful eyes may enter these solemn chambers unbidden.

5_4b.name: The Torched Courts
5_4b.flavourtext: Fuelled by blood and chaos, a dark inferno engulfs the halls of justice.

5_5.name: The Chamber of Innocence
5_5.flavourtext: In this holiest of sanctums, the High Templar communes with God and delivers His divine judgement.

5_6.name: The Ossuary
5_6.flavourtext: The faithful dead watch over the city with hollow eyes.

5_7.name: The Reliquary
5_7.flavourtext: A trove of shameful relics displayed with pride.

5_8.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
5_8.flavourtext: Atop this burning monument to arrogance, Oriath's final hope remains.

6_town.name: Lioneye's Watch
6_town.flavourtext: The shivering tides bring little hope, only desperation and despair.

6_1.name: The Twilight Strand
6_1.flavourtext: Those that now wash ashore seek no warmth or shelter, only to fill a bottomless void of pain and hunger.

6_2.name: The Coast
6_2.flavourtext: The Ancestors return to conquer these shores once again.

6_3.name: The Tidal Island
6_3.flavourtext: As the tide rises, hope is drowned.

6_4.name: The Mud Flats
6_4.flavourtext: Mud and blood make a fine war paint.

6_5.name: The Karui Fortress
6_5.flavourtext: The waters here, once stagnant and foul, now run clear with an ancient bloodlust.

6_6.name: The Ridge
6_6.flavourtext: The air is thin, the way is narrow.

6_7.name: The Prison
6_7.flavourtext: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

6_8.name: Prisoner's Gate
6_8.flavourtext: The hunting grounds of a cloven god.

6_9.name: The Western Forest
6_9.flavourtext: What madness flitters and creeps through the darkened trees?

6_10.name: The Riverways
6_10.flavourtext: These violent waters carry portents of death.

6_11.name: The Wetlands
6_11.flavourtext: A corpulent grub flails mindlessly, infesting the putrescent muck.

6_12.name: The Southern Forest
6_12.flavourtext: Insidious pupa populate under sweltering heat.

6_13.name: The Cavern of Anger
6_13.flavourtext: Stalactites drip in mourning for an ocean queen.

6_14.name: The Beacon
6_14.flavourtext: An echo of destiny consumes the land.

6_15.name: The Brine King's Reef
6_15.flavourtext: A coral throne for a salt-soured god.

7_town.name: The Bridge Encampment
7_town.flavourtext: Surviving rodents cling tight to cracks found in the masonry.

7_1.name: The Broken Bridge
7_1.flavourtext: The stonework trembles atop this petrified land.

7_2.name: The Crossroads
7_2.flavourtext: Ancient cruelty tears through the cobbled intersection.

7_3.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
7_3.flavourtext: A spirit of sadism blemishes the earth.

7_4.name: The Crypt
7_4.flavourtext: Ancestral memories given life, then soured.

7_5.name: The Chamber of Sins
7_5.flavourtext: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

7_5_map.name: Maligaro's Sanctum
7_5_map.flavourtext: The inner depths of decadent darkness.

7_6.name: The Den
7_6.flavourtext: Sodden spores flourish and feast on decaying flesh.

7_9.name: The Dread Thicket
7_9.flavourtext: Dripping with anger and grief, the ancient thicket weeps.

7_11.name: The Vaal City
7_11.flavourtext: Ancient and arcane, a civilisation lost to the dust of history.

7_12.name: The Temple of Decay
7_12.flavourtext: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

8_1.name: The Sarn Ramparts
8_1.flavourtext: A parapet shakes beneath a billowing sky.

8_town.name: The Sarn Encampment
8_town.flavourtext: A shaky peace descends, though swords will never rest.

8_2.name: The Toxic Conduits
8_2.flavourtext: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

8_3.name: The Grand Promenade
8_3.flavourtext: A favourite walk of noble lords, now fallen into disrepair.

8_4.name: The High Gardens
8_4.flavourtext: Creeping dread chokes life from this thriving terrace.

8_6.name: The Lunaris Concourse
8_6.flavourtext: Allegiances falter like the waning of the moon.

8_7.name: The Lunaris Temple
8_7.flavourtext: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

8_8.name: The Quay
8_8.flavourtext: The restless dead shift 'neath darkened waters.

8_9.name: The Grain Gate
8_9.flavourtext: A barrier trembles before undying feet.

8_10.name: The Imperial Fields
8_10.flavourtext: The savagery of war stains both muck and mire.

8_11.name: The Solaris Concourse
8_11.flavourtext: Conquered by the fog of war.

8_12.name: The Solaris Temple
8_12.flavourtext: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

8_13.name: The Harbour Bridge
8_13.flavourtext: A dark unrest sends ribbons to war.

9_1.name: The Blood Aqueduct
9_1.flavourtext: A mighty spillway tainted by tarrish blacks and sanguine reds.

9_town.name: Highgate
9_town.flavourtext: Survivors huddle 'neath baleful shadows of rot and decay.

9_2.name: The Descent
9_2.flavourtext: A freezing drop to test one's resolve.

9_3.name: The Vastiri Desert
9_3.flavourtext: Blustering sand, sharper than a bandit's blade.

9_4.name: The Oasis
9_4.flavourtext: A paradise hidden amongst sunbleached bones and blistering dunes.

9_5.name: The Foothills
9_5.flavourtext: The secrets of history lie hidden among layers of dirt and sand.

9_6.name: The Boiling Lake
9_6.flavourtext: These corrosive waters devour both flesh and bone.

9_7.name: The Tunnel
9_7.flavourtext: Unspeakable horrors filigree and haunt the nameless dark.

9_8.name: The Quarry
9_8.flavourtext: A monstrous terror stalks chthonic mines, yearning for the boundless sky.

9_9.name: The Refinery
9_9.flavourtext: Madness was visited upon those who dug too deep.

9_10.name: The Belly of the Beast
9_10.flavourtext: Once flushed with the warmness of blood, now festering; consumed by fungal rot.

9_11.name: The Rotting Core
9_11.flavourtext: The putrid interior oozes and spoils.

10_town.name: Oriath Docks
10_town.flavourtext: A final refuge, backed hard against the waves of a raging sea.

10_1.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
10_1.flavourtext: From above, the true scope of carnage is clearly espied.

10_2.name: The Ravaged Square
10_2.flavourtext: A flourishing place of trade, barely recognizable amidst the countless deaths.

10_3.name: The Torched Courts
10_3.flavourtext: Pious priests once dealt cruel justice within these halls, now they both smoulder in silent agony.

10_4.name: The Desecrated Chambers
10_4.flavourtext: Mad men toil under smoking skies to pervert a holy sanctum.

10_5.name: The Canals
10_5.flavourtext: A man-made rupture from which both blood and water flow.

10_6.name: The Feeding Trough
10_6.flavourtext: Cries of torment and pathetic moans as the unholy banquet of flesh continues.

10_7.name: The Control Blocks
10_7.flavourtext: Sadists and cut-throats break both bone and brain.

10_8.name: The Reliquary
10_8.flavourtext: Empty, broken shelves linger, looted and forgotten in the wake of this horrid war.

10_9.name: The Ossuary
10_9.flavourtext: The dead offer thanks, for they have been spared this final savagery.

11_town.name: Oriath
11_town.flavourtext: A new dawn rises on ruined stone. Hand in hand, those that remain toil for a better world.

11_lab.name: The Templar Laboratory
11_lab.flavourtext: Thaumaturgists once sought ever greater knowledge. Now they run and hide like all the others.
